Class KeywordFilterer

extends java.lang.Object

    andrew

      • filterWordsThatContainNumbers

        private static void filterWordsThatContainNumbers(java.util.ArrayList<Keyword> keywords)
        Identifies words such as lab1, lab1test etc and filters them out.
        Parameters:
        keywords - The keywords to be filtered out

      • filterNonFrequent

        private static void filterNonFrequent(java.util.ArrayList<Keyword> keywords)
        Removes words that are not frequent. MIN_FREQUENCY is a static variable that defines the lowest acceptable occurrence rate. Also removes words that have a minimum length of MIN_LENGTH.
        Parameters:
        keywords - The keywords to be filtered out

      • filterStopWords

        private static void filterStopWords(java.util.ArrayList<Keyword> keywords,
                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> stopwordsEn,
                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> stopwordsSv,
                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> stopwordsCourse)
        Iterated through all words and filters out the ones that match with the content of the method's parameters.
        Parameters:
        keywords - The list of words extracted by KeywordsExtractor
        stopwordsEn - The list of English stopwords to be filtered out.
        stopwordsSv - The list of Swedish stopwords to be filtered out.
        stopwordsCourse - The list of words relevant to courses and studying to be filtered out.
